title: Retry last failed deployment

requirements.text: Re-attempt the previous build and deployment. No code changes are required — this is a retry of the last failed deployment due to a transient technical error.
acceptanceCriteria: The application builds successfully without errors.
The deployed app is accessible and all previously implemented features remain functional.

constraints: Do not introduce any new features or code changes — this is a pure retry of the last deployment.
nonGoals: No new features, bug fixes, or refactors beyond what was already implemented.
